mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from SalesSellReceipt where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into SalesSellReceipt(dayId, operatorId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, receiptState, clientId, clerkName, stockName, goodsList, discountAmount, tokenAmount, originSum, comment) values(#{dayId}, #{operatorId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{receiptState}, #{clientId}, #{clerkName}, #{stockName}, #{goodsList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler}, #{discountAmount}, #{tokenAmount}, #{originSum}, #{comment})
mapper.update: update SalesSellReceipt set lastModifiedTime=#{lastModifiedTime}, receiptState=#{receiptState}, clientId=#{clientId}, clerkName=#{clerkName}, stockName=#{stockName}, goodsList=#{goodsList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler}, discountAmount=#{discountAmount}, tokenAmount=#{tokenAmount}, originSum=#{originSum}, comment=#{comment} where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.delete: delete from SalesSellReceipt where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from SalesSellReceipt where createTime >= #{begin} and createTime <= #{end}
